com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.ui

Class GameUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.ui.GameUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UI, Runnable, Observer

    public class GameUI
extends Object
implements UI, Observer
    The UI shown when playing the game. This UI consists of the game board, preview of the next tetromino, score (and level) panel and some buttons

    All user keyboard inputs are captured by this class.

    Author:
    tilastokeskus
    See Also:
    GameHandler, PausePanel, GamePanel, PreviewPanel, ScorePanel

      Constructs a game interface according to the given game handler.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameUI

        public GameUI(String title,
      GameHandler gHandler,
      CommandHandler cHandler)
        Constructs a game interface according to the given game handler. All user keyboard input will be relayed to the given command handler.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the frame that will be shown.
        gHandler - game handler according to which the frame is drawn.
        cHandler - command handler that handles user input and redirects associated commands to the game handler and its game.

    • Method Detail

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Description copied from interface: UI
        Shows or hides the UI depending on the given boolean value.
        Specified by:
        setVisible in interface UI
        Parameters:
        visible - true to show, false to hide.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the UI.

        Additionally terminates the game handler that has been passed to this class, as well as shows the main menu.

        Specified by:
        close in interface UI

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
